guigraph
Class GraphBoard

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gui.GameBoard
                      guigraph.GraphBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GraphBoard
extends GameBoard

This class provides the game board for arbitrary graphs. There are also drawing modes, where new nodes and edges can be added to the game board. It works with different MouseListeners.

Author:
Irene Thesing
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

DRAW_VERTEX_MODE

public static final int DRAW_VERTEX_MODE
If this mode is active, it is possible to draw new vertices by clicking on the canvas.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DRAW_EDGE_MODE

public static final int DRAW_EDGE_MODE
If this mode is active, it is possible to draw new edges by pressing on the first vertex and releasing on the second.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

public static final int DELETE_MODE
With this mode it is possible to delete nodes from the canvas.

public static final int MOVE_VERTEX_MODE
This mode helps to move vertices to other places, the edges are updated.

Constructor Detail

GraphBoard

public GraphBoard(int startMode)
Creates a new game board for the sigma game on graphs, beginning with two vertices.

Parameters:
startMode - the mode where the game board shall be at the beginning.

GraphBoard

public GraphBoard(int startMode,
                  GamingGraph gaming)
Creates a new game board for the sigma game on graphs, beginning with the given graph.

Parameters:
startMode - the mode where the game board shall be at the beginning.
gaming - the graph where we play the game on, connecting the game and the graph on the gui.

Description copied from class: GameBoard

initRecordPanel in class GameBoard

initSpecialMode

protected void initSpecialMode(int mode)
Description copied from class: GameBoard
If the subclass has some more possible mode values, they shall be dealed with in this method. Otherwise leave the method empty or throw some exception.

Specified by:
initSpecialMode in class GameBoard
Parameters:
mode - Some new mode values.

updateSituation

public void updateSituation()
Description copied from class: GameBoard
Updates a situation with the game configuration which is given by the actual state of the trisentis game. Updates also the record Panel if the mode is GAME_RECORD_MODE. The method is useful for GAME_MODE, GAME_RECORD_MODE or INPUT_MODE.

Specified by:
updateSituation in class GameBoard

updateSituation

public void updateSituation(boolean[] showSit)
Description copied from class: GameBoard
Updates a situation with the given configuration given as a list of boolean values, numbered in an array. This method is useful to show some solutions in SHOW_MODE.

Specified by:
updateSituation in class GameBoard
Parameters:
showSit - situation which shall be shown on the board.

startConGame

protected Game startConGame(boolean recordActive)
Description copied from class: GameBoard
Starts the game with or without record - here all the things are dealt which depends on the concrete game, so dealt with in the subclasses.

Specified by:
startConGame in class GameBoard
Parameters:
recordActive - whether the game shall be recorded.

startConInput

protected void startConInput()
Description copied from class: GameBoard
Here all the things are dealt which depends on the concrete game to start the input mode, so dealt with in the subclasses.

Specified by:
startConInput in class GameBoard

Returns:

public GamingGraph getGameGraph()
Returns the gameGraph belonging to the game logic.

drawPath

public void drawPath(int length)
Draws a path as a new graph with the given number of nodes.

Parameters:
length - number of nodes which shall be in the path.

drawCircle

public void drawCircle(int length)
Draws a circle as a new graph with the given number of nodes.

Parameters:

drawTriangle

public void drawTriangle(int height)
Draws a new triangle Trisentis game field where each middle node has six neighbors.

Parameters:
height - the height of the triangle.

drawBinaryTree

public void drawBinaryTree(int height)
Draws a new complete binary test.tree as a graph.

Parameters:
height - the height of the test.tree. Shall be one or bigger.

drawTertiaryTree

public void drawTertiaryTree(int height)
Draws a new complete 3-test.tree as a graph.

Parameters:
height - the height of the test.tree. Shall be one or bigger.
